attributes.action: Save Fort William's Belford Hospital from possible closure!
attributes.additional_details: There are rumours circulating that Fort William's Belford Hospital may be about to be closed. If these rumours are true, Lochaber and its many visitors will be deprived of a first-class and much needed medical facility. Please, PLEASE, sign this petition to keep the Belford going in Fort William: WE NEED THE BELFORD!
